dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1453 IH: Customs Business Fairness Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Garbarino (for himself, Mr. Meeks, Mr. Bacon, and Mrs. McBath) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend title 11 of the United States Code, to allow full subrogation, including subrogation to the priority rights of the United States, of claims for the payment of customs duties.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Customs Business Fairness Act of 2023.
Section 507(d) of title 11, United States Code, is amended by inserting excluding subparagraph (F) after (a)(8).

subsection.text: Except as provided in subsection (b), this Act and the amendment made by this Act shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act.
The amendment made by this Act shall not apply with respect to cases commenced under title 11 of the United States Code before the date of the enactment of this Act.
